title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.26 - Unlawful Exposure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.26 - Unlawful Exposure

State Regulations

It shall be a violation of these rules to appear in public on
property under the jurisdiction of ParksCorp in such a manner that one's
genitalia are unclothed or exposed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.26

Adopted

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
